name: Nfected
description:
You have been infected with the deadliest VIRUS known to man.
Instead of looking for a cure you decide to get back at everyone for all the pain they have caused you.

Can you get them all before the Killer Doctors get YOU?
Play to find out!

My best time is 53.47, how fast did you beat the game?
(lemme know in the comments)

Have Fun!
